name: Deepwoken (freshie adventure)
description: the first game of a multiseries based on the hit triple A game available for all platforms "Deepwoken", set in the country Delaware, 2 freshies set on an adventure to regain their once lost power. however, little do they know that they get themselves in the worst trouble yet. play now for Widons, Mac (apple, macantosh) and linus!!!!
